org.fluidity.testing

Interface Simulator.Task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Command.Job<Exception>
    Enclosing class:
    Simulator
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface Simulator.Task
extends Command.Job<Exception>
    Encapsulates a sequence of code to execute as part of some test case.

    Usage

    See Simulator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Simulator.Task.Concurrent
      A factory of concurrent tasks, to be used with Simulator.Threads.concurrent(Simulator.Task.Concurrent).

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.fluidity.foundation.Command.Job

        run
